title: Add TUI indicator for context generation status
description:
Show context generation status in the TUI during epic runs.

## Requirements
- Show 'Generating context...' during generation
- Show context status in header (✓ Context ready / ○ No context)
- Log context generation events in log pane

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Status message during context generation phase
- [ ] Header shows context status icon
- [ ] Log entry when context generated
- [ ] Log entry when context loaded from cache
- [ ] Log entry when generation skipped (single-task epic)

## UI Elements
- Header: `Epic: xyz [✓ Context]` or `Epic: xyz [○ No ctx]`
- Log: `[10:30:15] Context generated (2847 tokens)`
- Log: `[10:30:15] Context loaded from cache`
